filebin 0.0.4
  • Reference

Upload a file to Filebin

file_post.Rd

Upload a file to Filebin

file_post(path, bin = NA)

Arguments

path

Path to a file. If a vector then upload multiple files.
bin

Bin name. If NA the generate random bin name.

Value

A tibble.

Examples

# Upload a single file.
file_post(LOREM_IPSUM)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 9
#>   url      bin    filename  content_type  bytes md5     sha256   updated created
#>   <chr>    <chr>  <chr>     <chr>         <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 https:/… zq1jp… lorem-ip… text/plain; …  7363 ZmE2ZT… ed0b07a… 2021-1… 2021-1…
# Upload multiple files.
file_post(c(LOREM_IPSUM, MORE_LOREM_IPSUM))
#> # A tibble: 2 × 9
#>   url      bin    filename  content_type  bytes md5     sha256   updated created
#>   <chr>    <chr>  <chr>     <chr>         <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 https:/… ohnn3… lorem-ip… text/plain; …  7363 ZmE2ZT… ed0b07a… 2021-1… 2021-1…
#> 2 https:/… ohnn3… more-lor… text/plain; …  8050 NTIxZT… 934d05f… 2021-1… 2021-1…

# Upload to a specific bin.
bin <- bin_name_random(length = 24)
file_post(LOREM_IPSUM, bin)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 9
#>   url      bin    filename  content_type  bytes md5     sha256   updated created
#>   <chr>    <chr>  <chr>     <chr>         <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 https:/… 7p2ct… lorem-ip… text/plain; …  7363 ZmE2ZT… ed0b07a… 2021-1… 2021-1…

# To get details of the HTTP request.
httr::with_verbose(file_post(LOREM_IPSUM))
#> 
#> # A tibble: 1 × 9
#>   url      bin    filename  content_type  bytes md5     sha256   updated created
#>   <chr>    <chr>  <chr>     <chr>         <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 https:/… jl9ah… lorem-ip… text/plain; …  7363 ZmE2ZT… ed0b07a… 2021-1… 2021-1…
